About Oort Digtal

Oort Digital a DeFi aggregator for NFTs. Oort Digital aims to build an NFT super account with seamless user experience. We believe that NFT has a better chance to introduce cypto to the mainstream then bitcoin. It is beacuse NFT is able to represent things we can better understand, such as in-game items,tickets,houses,cars etc. Our vision is to accelerate the mass adoption of NFTs across the globe.

Try our NFTleasing product oLeasing

Challenges We Aim to Solve

01

Valuation

Valuing a certian NFT is difficult due to its unique properties.

02

Liquidity

Due to the difficulty of NFT valuation,it usually takes a much longer time to match the buyers and sellers.

03

User Experience

Decentralized applications are difficult to access for most people.

Ultimately,Oort Digital aims to be an NFT Super Account
